Outbound SMB or WebDAV traffic originati.Data: Zeek conn.log; Zeek smb.log; Zeek http.log
Outbound SMB or WebDAV traffic originati.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log, smb.log (TCP 139, 445, UDP 137), and http.log (TCP 80, 443) for connections originating from internal network segments destined for external, non-corporate IP ranges. Identify connections where the destination IP is not known or expected. Use correlation analysis to link outbound SMB/WebDAV connections with suspicious internal events (e.g., email receipt, file opening).

Creation or modification of .LNK or .SCF.Data: Windows Event ID 4663; Windows Event ID 4688
Creation or modification of .LNK or .SCF.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 on endpoints for attempts to write/modify files with .lnk or .scf extensions. Correlate these events with process creation (Event ID 4688) to identify the source process. Analyze associated network connections (potentially using Zeek conn.log) to confirm external resource references using correlation analysis.

Unusual internal SMB or WebDAV traffic b.Data: Zeek conn.log; Zeek smb.log; Zeek http.log
Unusual internal SMB or WebDAV traffic b.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log, smb.log (ports 139, 445), and http.log (ports 80, 443) for connections between internal hosts (workstation-to-workstation or server-to-workstation) using SMB or WebDAV protocols. Establish baselines for typical internal SMB/WebDAV traffic patterns (source/destination hosts, volume, time of day) using descriptive statistics and time series analysis. Flag deviations from baseline behavior, particularly connections involving hosts that don't typically communicate via SMB/WebDAV, or occurring outside normal work hours.

Processes known to open external documen.Data: Windows Event ID 4688; Windows Event ID 5156; Zeek conn.log; Zeek smb.log; Zeek http.log
Processes known to open external documen.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for processes like 'winword.exe', 'explorer.exe', etc. Filter Windows Event ID 5156 for outbound connection attempts by these processes targeting SMB (445, 139) or WebDAV (80, 443) ports. Correlate these endpoint events with Zeek conn.log entries showing successful or failed outbound connections to the same ports from the corresponding host IPs. Investigate instances where typical user applications initiate network connections to external SMB/WebDAV resources.
